name: Dungeonmans: The Heroic Adventure Roguelike
blurb: Crush monsters and get loot in a persistent world full of gorgeous 2D sprite work with a sweeping throwback soundtrack.

rewards.reward: NPC: Not everyone has the courage to step up to the rough and tumble life of a Dungeonmans. Someone's got to stock the shops, wander aimlessly near anchors, and stand behind a bar cleaning a mug with a dirty rag. Thank you, NPC. We couldn't do it without you, and we'll mention as much when we put you in the credits.

ADVENTURER: One DRM-Free digital copy of Dungeonmans on all platforms it is released on. Should Dungeonmans end up on Steam, you'll get a key for a Steam copy as well. If you like, you can also submit one line of wisdom to be added to the Wall of Text, the in-game monument to talky tutorials.

PIONEER'S GUILD: Welcome aboard! You'll get the Adventurer reward above, as well as EARLY ACCESS to the Dungeonmans Beta, scheduled to begin sometime before shipping. You'll also receive high fidelity digital copy of the Dungeonmans original SOUNDTRACK. Finally, all PIONEER'S GUILD members can contribute one NAME of their choice to be thrown into the collection of random names for monsters, NPCs, and locations!

DIGITAL EXPLORER: Want to blaze a trail without weighing yourself down with physical goods? As a DIGITAL EXPLORER you'll get all the Guild rewards above with EARLY ACCESS to the Dungeonmans ALPHA, which will is scheduled to begin sometime in the fall of 2013. See features as they are implemented and provide immediate feedback. Find powerful exploits, test monsters to help define their behavior, and marvel at crash after crash. You'll also receive a PDF copy of THE DUNGEONMANS ALMANAC, a combination Academy Yearbook / Dungeonmans Artbook full of both in game information and behind the scenes detail.

TRAILBLAZER: A true Pioneer, you'll get all the Guild rewards above with EARLY ACCESS to the Dungeonmans ALPHA, which will is scheduled to begin sometime in the fall of 2013. See features as they are implemented and provide immediate feedback. Find powerful exploits, test monsters to help define their behavior, and marvel at crash after crash. In addition to the digital soundtrack, you'll receive a glistening physical copy of the Dungeonmans soundtrack as well! Finally, you'll receive a PDF copy of THE DUNGEONMANS ALMANAC, a combination Academy Yearbook / Dungeonmans Artbook full of both in game information and behind the scenes detail.

FRONTIERSMAN: All Trailblazer rewards included. You'll receive a SIGNED physical copy of the Dungeonmans soundtrack, and the DECK OF IDENTIFICATION, a full color physical deck of cards covering all the ferocious beasts to be found in the wild! Picture and vital stats on the front, detailed information about diet, migration patterns, and preferred flavor of Dungeonmens on the back. Hero-saving information at your fingertips!

MANS AT ARMS: All Frontiersman rewards. Work with the developers to design a WEAPON found in the world of Dungeonmans. You provide the name and the details, we'll smooth them out together, then get a fancy sprite made to represent the weapon.

ARMORSMITH: All Frontiersman rewards + awesome HARDCOVER physical edition of the Dungeonmans Almanac signed by the team. Work with the developers to design a 4-piece set of ARMOR, complete with set bonuses. You provide the name, the details, and what you'd like the armor to do, and we'll work it out together. Players will be discover your armor and if they have the right Academy upgrades, be able to store special set pieces for future generations!

BEASTMASTER: All Frontiersman rewards + awesome HARDCOVER physical edition of the Dungeonmans Almanac signed by the team. Work with the developers to design a MONSTER for Dungeonmens to crush! This monster will get thrown into the mix and appear in dungeons based on the location and monster level. Provide the name, the details, we'll work it out together and build a badass monster, including a unique sprite.

WARLORD: All Frontiersman rewards + awesome HARDCOVER physical edition of the Dungeonmans Almanac signed by the team. Work with the developers to create a MONSTER SQUAD that will work together and attack as a group! Build up to 4 monsters that will appear together in dungeons, overworld encounters, or other appropriate locales. Together we'll come up with art, style, and behaviors that make for a challenging fight. Put your old D&D group back together, sworn to the service of evil!

SPONSORS LIKE YOU: All Frontiersman rewards + awesome HARDCOVER physical edition of the Dungeonmans Almanac signed by the team. Have an entire CLASSROOM of the Dungeonmans Academy dedicated to you or someone you choose. Work with the developers to decide what feature this provides to the Academy, how it is upgraded, and what it looks like. The end product will be similar to the Alchemy Lab or Library in the preview build. Together we'll decide on custom art and a naming scheme, and you'll have built something that every player can use.

CHAMPION: All Frontiersman rewards + awesome HARDCOVER physical edition of the Dungeonmans Almanac signed by the team. Work with the developers on having your own HERO and MASTERY built for Dungeonmans. This includes a unique hero sprite, and a Mastery with 3 to 5 powers that we'll build together. Players will be able to weave these skills into their own builds and choose your hero sprite to sally forth towards great adventure.

DUNGEON MASTER: All Frontiersman rewards + awesome HARDCOVER physical edition of the Dungeonmans Almanac signed by the team. Work with the developers to create YOUR VERY OWN DUNGEON. The look and feel, layout, whether it will be randomly generated or a static encounter in every world. New art, a new collection of monsters, and a unique piece of background music that will complete the experience. We'll do this together, and if you are in the US and would like to travel then we will provide arrangements to get you out here to visit with myself and zircon to make sure we plan everything just right. You will learn first hand about game development, as well as create something that is part of the very foundation of the Dungeonmans adventure.
